comments:
Not able to run JUnit 4.1 Testcase, because of SWT dependancy for swt-win32-3235. In Library path only swt-win32-3236 is available. JRE is 1.5.

What sources/logs do you need?

Log is:

org.eclipse.swt.win32.x86_3.2.1.v3235 lies in Source path for the Project of the application. Trying to add it to the library path...

At least one problem here is that, as you mention in comment 1, org.eclipse.swt.win32.x86_3.2.1.v3235 is in the project's source path.  You should have the org.eclipse.swt.win32.win32.x86_3.2.2.v3236.jar that comes with 3.2.2 in the build path instead, because the swt in eclipse 3.2.2 uses libraries with version 3236, not 3235.

Please give this a try and follow up here whether this gets you running or not.
Reopen this bug if you the things Grant told you to try did not work.
